attributes.action: Help us overturn Ebays decision to ban the sale of used cloth nappies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ebay has take the decision to ban the sale of used cloth nappies denying the opportunity for people who want to try out different types before purchase or who cannot afford the cost of buying new the chance to play their part in saving the planet from disposables.  This decision is not in line with today's green agenda.
